title: 2000 Italian Grand Prix
summary: The 2000 Italian Grand Prix (formally the LXXI Gran Premio Campari d'Italia) was a Formula One motor race held on 10 September 2000 at the Autodromo Nazionale di Monza near Monza, Lombardy, Italy. It was the 14th race of the 2000 Formula One World Championship and the 71st Italian Grand Prix. Ferrari driver Michael Schumacher won the 53-lap race from pole position.
